0.name: Normal Attack
0.desc: The most basic type of attack.

1.name: Quick Strike
1.desc: Deliver a fast, precise attack before the enemy can react. Deals 120% damage with lightning speed.

2.name: Fire Strike
2.desc: Slash the enemy with a heated blade, dealing damage and applying a burning effect that slowly drains their health over time.

3.name: Heavy Smash
3.desc: Unleash a crushing blow that hits harder than a basic attack.

4.name: Fire Ball
4.desc: Casts a blazing orb of fire that deals significant damage upon impact.

5.name: Amethyst Bolt
5.desc: A radiant purple crystal projectile, dealing heavy magic damage to its target.

6.name: Lightning Strike
6.desc: Summon a devastating bolt of electricity from the sky.

7.name: Roar of Ferocity
7.desc: Unleash a thunderous roar, imbuing allies with increased strength and ferocity.

8.name: Poisonous Snake
8.desc: Spit a venomous serpent that bites the target with one of the most deadly poisons ever to exist.

9.name: Maelstrom Blast
9.desc: A fierce tempest that engulfs the battlefield with devastating power.

10.name: Dagger Strike
10.desc: A swift and precise attack with a dagger, dealing immediate damage and potentially causing a bleeding effect on the target.

11.name: Bloody Bite
11.desc: Inflicts severe bleeding, causing immediate damage and inducing a lingering blood loss effect over time.

12.name: Frostflare Spin
12.desc: The snow rabbit curls up and begins spinning, unleashing a storm of ice shards that pierce its enemies.

13.name: Ember
13.desc: Release a small flame that inflicts minor harm.

14.name: Inferno Rage
14.desc: The Ignis Dragon unleashes a devastating wave of fire, incinerating everything in its path with relentless fury.

15.name: Frost Spikes
15.desc: Shards of ice shoot from the attacker, flying swiftly towards the enemy to impale with freezing precision.

16.name: Toxic Strike
16.desc: The monster delivers a swift attack laced with poison, inflicting damage over time.

17.name: Pure Force
17.desc: A straightforward, solid attack that uses raw physical power to hit the enemy.

18.name: Pollen Burst
18.desc: Releases a cloud of pollen that engulfs enemies, causing irritation and confusion.

19.name: Heavy Punch
19.desc: A powerful, concentrated blow delivered with full force, capable of staggering or knocking back opponents.

20.name: Poison Attack
20.desc: Delivers a venomous strike that injects toxins into the enemy, dealing damage over time and weakening their defenses.

21.name: Fury Swipe
21.desc: A rapid series of claw attacks, slashing at the enemy with relentless speed and ferocity.

22.name: Ice Blast
22.desc: Unleashes a burst of frigid energy, freezing enemies on impact and dealing ice damage.

23.name: Gale Slash
23.desc: Summons fierce winds that slice through enemies, delivering cutting damage with razor-sharp gusts.

24.name: Bloody Rush
24.desc: The monster launches into a brutal charge, its horn piercing and tearing through the enemy, leaving a trail of blood in its wake.

25.name: Flame Pulse
25.desc: The dragon unleashes a quick wave of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

26.name: Enflame
26.desc: A fiery attack that inflicts burning damage over time.

27.name: Quick Slash
27.desc: A blinding flurry of slashes that finds and exploits vulnerabilities for massive damage.

28.name: Thunder Strike
28.desc: A lightning-quick strike that stuns the opponent, leaving them unable to act.

29.name: Poisoned Arrow
29.desc: Fires a venomous arrow that rapidly saps the target's health.

30.name: Bullseye
30.desc: A precisely aimed shot that pierces vital areas for massive damage.

31.name: Frost Volley
31.desc: Launches an ice-enchanted volley of arrows that deals frost damage over time.

32.name: Rotten Swing
32.desc: A savage swing that leaves a festering wound, causing deteriorating damage.

33.name: Heavy Cleave
33.desc: A massive horizontal axe swing that stuns opponents.

34.name: Bludgeon
34.desc: An overwhelming overhead strike that crushes defenses for devastating damage.

35.name: Precise Thrust
35.desc: A well-aimed spear thrust that penetrates weak points for massive damage.

36.name: Foot Sweep
36.desc: A deft leg sweep that topples enemies, leaving them stunned and vulnerable.

37.name: Thrust of Inferno
37.desc: A fiery spear thrust that scorches enemies with massive flame damage.

38.name: Shockwave
38.desc: Unleashes a cascading wave of arcane force that ruptures through foes' defenses.

39.name: Fire Ball
39.desc: Conjures an explosive ball of flame that deals burning damage.

40.name: Shatter Earth
40.desc: Ruptures the ground in a stunning shockwave that immobilizes enemies.

41.name: Venom Stab
41.desc: A lightning-quick strike infused with a potent toxin for rapid health degeneration.

42.name: Serpent Strike
42.desc: A snaking series of venomous strikes that repeatedly pierce and poison vulnerable areas.

43.name: Backstab
43.desc: A treacherous attack on an undefended foe, dealing absolutely devastating damage.

44.name: Stab of Agony
44.desc: A vicious stab laced with agonizing venom that lingers in the wound.

45.name: Ember Shot
45.desc: Launches a flaming arrow that scorches enemies with burn damage.

46.name: Whirlwind Strike
46.desc: A cyclonic flurry of axe strikes that overwhelms defenses for devastating damage.

47.name: Sunlight Attack
47.desc: Channels the sun's searing rays through the spearhead for sustained burning.

48.name: Noxious Gas
48.desc: Envelops the area in a choking miasma that rapidly poisons those caught within.

49.name: Knife Throw
49.desc: A precisely aimed thrown knife that finds and exploits any unguarded opening.
